cases.title: Budweiser vs. Rescue Club discrepancy
cases.explanation: Forced choice favors Budweiser despite a flatter purchase-likelihood curve, suggesting brand inertia. Rescue Club attracts mid-level intent but fails to convert at the top of the scale, pointing to messaging gaps that limit commitment.

cases.title: Heineken 0.0 vs. Green River discrepancy
cases.explanation: Heineken shows stronger top-box intent, while Green River clusters in the middle of the scale. This mismatch implies that trial interest exists for Green River, but confidence declines when a single pick is required.
